hint.template: Use `Finish[answer]` to return the answer and finish the task. Please do not reply with anything other than `Finish[answer]` in the Action phase.

reflection_header.template: You have attempted to complete a following task before. The following reflection(s) give a new plan to complete the task in the same way you did previously. Use them to improve your strategy of correctly completing the given task.
